description: An animated SVG rainbow arc displayed on the main page, rendered as concentric colored arcs using the classic ROYGBIV spectrum with a smooth fade-in animation on load.

userStories.title: SVG Rainbow Arc on Main Page
userStories.description: As a user, I want a colorful SVG rainbow arc on the main page so that the application feels more visually delightful.
acceptanceCriteria: A RainbowArc component is created that renders an inline SVG element (no external image files)

The SVG contains seven concentric semi-circular arcs representing the ROYGBIV spectrum: red (#FF0000), orange (#FF7F00), yellow (#FFFF00), green (#00FF00), blue (#0000FF), indigo (#4B0082), violet (#9400D3)
Each arc is a <path> element using an SVG arc command, with a stroke-width of 8px and no fill
The outermost arc (red) has a radius of approximately 150px, with each inner arc decreasing by 10px
The rainbow is horizontally centered on the page and placed below the main heading
The SVG has a viewBox that properly frames all arcs without clipping
The rainbow fades in on page load using a CSS opacity transition (0 to 1 over 1 second)
The component has data-testid='rainbow-arc' on the SVG element for testability
The SVG has role='img' and an aria-label of 'Decorative rainbow' for accessibility
